interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: YinMer Lavish Lash – Eyelash Growth Enhancer & Brow Serum with Biotin & Natural Growth Peptides for Long, Thick Lashes and Eyebrows
Review Date: 2020/12/15
Store: OUZIFISH
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.61 x 2.8 x 1.26 inches; 3.53 Ounces'}
Review Text: This eyebrow serum came beautifully packaged beyond anything I expected. The packaging and presentation gave the immediate feel of an expensive and regal product. The actual tube and brush of the serum also are impeccable with regard to presentation. The serum itself is very basic and lacking a little in desired thickness. Using a simple thin brush like the one that is provided makes for a bit of a challenge in applying such a watery textured liquid to your brow. A spoolie type brush would have made application on your brows much easier. Having said that, the brush that is provided is perfect for application of the serum to your eyelashes which, like brows, respond to the same formulas to encourage retention of existing lashes and brows and promote growth of new ones. I have been using this product nightly for nearly two months now and definitely see a bit of noticeable growth in my lashes and some growth, though not as noticeable, in my brows. Part of that could be due to the slow rate of growth of eyebrows and part could be due to the uneven application on my eyebrows with the small liner like application brush. I will continue to use the product until it is finished but will definitely be looking for a serum with a spoolie style applicator for my next brow growth serum.
Review Title: Better for a lash serum than brows ... but it’s workable
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
3D Mink Eyelashes Natural Long Lashes 2 in 1 Self-adhesive Eyeliner Instead of Adhesive 5 Different Styles Pairs Kits Sets with Tweezers , NO NEED GLUE
PURELEOR
{'Brand': 'PURELEOR', 'Material': 'Mink Fur', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Unit Count': '5.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6 x 1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '750810450143'}
This set of lashes comes with five pairs in different styles, a set of tweezers and a liquid eyeliner that also acts as glue. The styles vary from casual day to day wear to dramatic showstoppers. The lashes are synthetic fibers with a medium band that is sturdy and with proper care can be used easily 20 or more times. They are soft and comfortable to wear with a secure hold for all day wear. With the liner functioning as a glue, you eliminate the need for an extra step and instead of putting glue on the lash band, you put it on as you would a normal liner making application incredibly easy, even for a beginner. I love these lashes!!!
Perfect lashes for a beginner or pro!
YinMer Lavish Lash – Eyelash Growth Enhancer & Brow Serum with Biotin & Natural Growth Peptides for Long, Thick Lashes and Eyebrows
OUZIFISH
{'Package Dimensions': '6.61 x 2.8 x 1.26 inches; 3.53 Ounces'}
This eyebrow serum came beautifully packaged beyond anything I expected. The packaging and presentation gave the immediate feel of an expensive and regal product. The actual tube and brush of the serum also are impeccable with regard to presentation. The serum itself is very basic and lacking a little in desired thickness. Using a simple thin brush like the one that is provided makes for a bit of a challenge in applying such a watery textured liquid to your brow. A spoolie type brush would have made application on your brows much easier. Having said that, the brush that is provided is perfect for application of the serum to your eyelashes which, like brows, respond to the same formulas to encourage retention of existing lashes and brows and promote growth of new ones. I have been using this product nightly for nearly two months now and definitely see a bit of noticeable growth in my lashes and some growth, though not as noticeable, in my brows. Part of that could be due to the slow rate of growth of eyebrows and part could be due to the uneven application on my eyebrows with the small liner like application brush. I will continue to use the product until it is finished but will definitely be looking for a serum with a spoolie style applicator for my next brow growth serum.
Better for a lash serum than brows ... but it’s workable
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Enjoys high-quality cosmetic products, particularly versatile false eyelashes suitable for varied styles, from casual to dramatic. Recently explored eyelash and brow serums indicating an interest in enhancing natural beauty.
- **Application Convenience:** Values easy application methods, expressed through a preference for self-adhesive items and multifunctional products. The recent interaction highlighted the need for user-friendly applicators, especially for brow serums.
- **User Experience:** Prioritizes comfort, durability, and reusability, preferring products that can be effectively used multiple times with proper care. The user’s recent experience with a serum involved concerns about application ease, pointing to a strong focus on functional design.
- **Target Audience:** Interested in products suitable for all skill levels, indicating a preference for high-quality options that do not compromise on ease of use, as evidenced by the recent review on a brow serum.
- **Material Sensitivity:** Favors soft, comfortable materials that provide a luxurious feel, reinforcing a desire for premium products in their beauty routine.

Overall, the user demonstrates a strong inclination toward practical, user-friendly beauty solutions that enhance their cosmetic experience while providing options for different occasions. The recent interest in growth serums reflects a broader commitment to achieving natural beauty enhancements.
